revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Multi EXP |image = [[file:Bag_EXP_Share_Sprite.png]] |caption = Dessin of the ''EXP Share''. |dex = 50 |effect = Gagner plus d'EXP en combattant }} Le '''Multi EXP''' est un [[Oak Items|Objet de Chen]]. Equipé, il augmente l'expérience reçue par vos Pokémon. Le Multi EXP est débloqué après avoir capturé 50 espèces différentes de Pokémon. == Détails == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Niveau !! Effet !! Critère d'amélioration !! Coût d'amélioration |- |0 || EXP gagnée X 1,15 || 500 Pokémon vaincus|| Style="text-align:right;" | 50 000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || EXP gagnée X 1,18|| 500 Pokémon vaincus || Style="text-align:right;" | 100 000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || EXP gagnée X 1,21|| 1 500 Pokémon vaincus|| Style="text-align:right;" | 250 000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || EXP gagnée X 1,24|| 2 500 Pokémon vaincus || Style="text-align:right;" | 500 000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || EXP gagnée X 1,27 || 5 000 Pokémon vaincus || Style="text-align:right;" | 1 000 000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || EXP gagnée X 1,3|| N/A || Style="text-align:right;"| N/A |- |}

revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Multi EXP |image = [[file:Bag_EXP_Share_Sprite.png]] |caption = Dessin of the ''EXP Share''. |dex = 50 |effect = Gagner plus d'EXP en combattant }}
The '''EXP Share''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount of experience Pokémon gain. The EXP Share is unlocked after catching 50 unique Pokémon.
== Details ==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirements !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || x1.15 EXP Earned || 500 defeated Pokémon || Style="text-align:right;" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || x1.18 EXP Earned || 500 defeated Pokémon || Style="text-align:right;" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || x1.21 EXP Earned || 1500 defeated Pokémon || Style="text-align:right;" | 250,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || x1.24 EXP Earned || 2500 defeated Pokémon || Style="text-align:right;" | 500,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || x1.27 EXP Earned || 5000 defeated Pokémon || Style="text-align:right;" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || x1.3 EXP Earned || N/A || Style="text-align:right;"| N/A |- |}

The '''EXP Share''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the amount of experience Pokémon gain. The EXP Share is unlocked after catching 50 unique Pokémon.
